text: Nevernyye smeyalis' nad Mukhammadom - da blagoslovit yego Allakh i privetstvuyet! - i govorili, izdevayas' nad nim: "Chem otlichayetsya etot chelovek, kotoryy utverzhdayet, chto on poslannik, ot nas? Ved' on yest tak zhe, kak i my yedim, i khodit po rynkam s odnogo mesta na drugoye, chtoby zarabotat' na khleb, kak delayut i vse drugiye lyudi. Yesli by on byl poslannikom, to mogushchestva Allakha khvatilo by, chtoby udovletvorit' yego nuzhdy ili nisposlat' angela, chtoby tot pomogal yemu v uveshchevanii i peredache Poslaniya i podtverdil by yego prizyv. Togda by my uverovali v yego poslaniye i prizyv
